Docs.summary: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks In a visual designer, when you switch from source view to a design view, the markup source code that describes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. When you switch back to source view, the design-time control is persisted to markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page. The ValidationSummaryDesigner objects provide design-time support for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> controls in a visual designer.
> [!NOTE] > This type is new as of ASP.NET 4.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Control designers use methods that are derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to shadow control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, to add properties to the properties grid, to remove properties from the properties grid, and to change attributes of properties in the properties grid.
